issue.title: [Format] Add "byte width" field with default of 16 to Decimal Flatbuffers type for forward compatibility
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8985](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8985). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This will permit larger or smaller decimals to be added to the format later without having to add a new Type union value
